function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for virus residence on surfaces and materials","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and contamination","Mitigation":"Frequent cleaning and disinfection, use of materials with reduced virus residence time","Technologies":"Hands-free door opening systems, copper-based materials, touch-free digital solutions","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management and maintenance teams"},{"Description":"Insufficient ventilation and airflow in buildings","Impact":"Higher risk of airborne virus transmission and poor indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation systems, natural ventilation, HVAC system upgrades","Technologies":"New HVAC filters, thermal sensors, natural ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants and visitors","Owner":"Building owners and facility managers"},{"Description":"Lack of sustainable and resilient design in urban areas","Impact":"Decreased resilience to future outbreaks and environmental challenges","Mitigation":"Adopting sustainable and resilient design practices, increasing green areas and nature-based solutions","Technologies":"Minimalist building design, increased green spaces, renewable energy supply","People":"Urban residents and local communities","Owner":"City planners and urban developers"}]}
